thread.title: Kim Phuc: Girl in Vietnam napalm photo receives medical treatment for burns 50 years later
thread.title_full: Kim Phuc: Girl in Vietnam napalm photo receives medical treatment for burns 50 years later - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Kim Phuc: Girl in Vietnam napalm photo receives medical treatment for burns 50 years later
text: As Kim Phuc fled the aftermath of a napalm attack – her face agape in terror and pain – the nine-year-old unwittingly became a living symbol of the horrors of the Vietnam War . Some forty years later, the 52-year-old is receiving medical
